backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all major frontend components and data files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, font preconnects, and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling Header, Hero, all GodSection collections, ContactSection, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Contact section showing email and phone cards with icons, call‑to‑action buttons, and decorative background.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying brand info, collection shortcuts, contact links, dynamic year, and attribution.
Reusable section rendering a titled collection with descriptive text and a grid of ItemCards.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo and responsive navigation supporting smooth scrolling and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/site/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with background imagery, decorative elements, and a button that scrolls to the collections section.
frontend/src/components/site/ItemCard.ts: Card component that displays an image, title, and description with hover animations.
frontend/src/data/placeholders.ts: Defines a MarbleItem interface and provides static placeholder item lists for multiple deity categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider, handling authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file reserved for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles and Tailwind layers defining typography, color variables, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, components, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the website project's current state, required marble statue images, and issues with mismatched artwork across collections. Marks this as a fix request with detailed image specifications.
